  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "Plan Options";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.

    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="column-66 float-left">
      <div id="tcm1703-2202">
       <div id="sustContainer">
        <h1>
         Meal Plans
        </h1>
        <div>
         <p>
          Muhlenberg’s dining program offers variety, convenience and flexibility to students living on and off campus. Campus meal plans are designed to fit the lifestyles of Muhlenberg students. 
         </p>
         <ul>
          <li>
           Feel free to visit the dining team at our offices in Seegers Union or call us at (484) 664-3488. 
          </li>
          <li>
           View "
           <a target="_blank" title="WOYP 2016 - 2017 WEB" href="/Images/WOYP_16_17_WEB_tcm1703-110494.pdf">
            What's On Your Plate
           </a>
           ," our complete 2016-2017 Meal Plan brochure
          </li>
          <li>
           Which Meal Plans are you eligible for based on housing? Find out here:
           <a target="_blank" title="Meal-Plan-Eligibility-Policy.pdf" href="/Images/Meal-Plan-Eligibility-Policy_tcm1703-51565.pdf">
            Meal Plan Eligibility Policy
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <div>
          <img title="2016-2017 Meal Plans" alt="2016-2017 Meal Plans" style="width: 649px; height: 841px;" src="/Images/2016%20WOYP%20MEAL_PLAN_INSERT_Page_1_tcm1703-110489.jpg" />
          <br />
         </div>
         <div>
          <br />
         </div>
         <div>
          <img title="Meal Plan Matrix Fall 2016" alt="Meal Plan Matrix Fall 2016" style="width: 649px; height: 502px;" src="/Images/Managing_Meal_Plan_F16_Dig_tcm1703-123551.jpg" />
          <br />
         </div>
         <div>
          <a target="_blank" title="Meal Plan Matrix Fall 2016" href="/Images/Managing_Meal_Plan_F16_tcm1703-123552.pdf">
           Please click here for a printable version.
          </a>
         </div>
         <div>
          <br />
         </div>
         <div>
          <img title="Berg_Wrap_Banner" alt="Berg_Wrap_Banner" style="width: 649px; height: 169px;" src="/Images/Berg_Banner_5_tcm1703-96016.jpg" />
            
         </div>
         <div>
          <br />
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <script type="text/javascript" src="https://images.sodexomyway.com/js/catering-lto.js">
       </script>
       <div class="lto" data-keyword="">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="column-33 float-right">
      <div id="loggedin">
       <span id="span_loggedin">
       </span>
      </div>
      <div class="sub-news-top">
       <div class="sub-news-rt">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="sub-news">
       <span class="RHS_Title">
        In This Section
       </span>
       <ul>
        <li>
         <a href="/dining-plans/eligibility.html" title="Meal Plan Eligibility" target="_self">
          Meal Plan Eligibility
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/dining-plans/faq.html" title="Dining FAQs" target="_self">
          Dining FAQs
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/dining-plans/berg-bucks.html" title="'BERG BUCKS" target="_self">
          'BERG BUCKS
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/dining-plans/berg-bucks-faqs.html" title="'BERG BUCKS FAQs" target="_self">
          'BERG BUCKS FAQs
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/dining-plans/summer_bucks.html" title="Summer Bucks" target="_self">
          Summer Bucks
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
       <div>
        <span class="RHS_Title">
         Important Info
        </span>
        <h2>
         Dining Policies
        </h2>
        <p>
         To ensure the highest quality service possible, Muhlenberg Dining has developed the following policies: 
        </p>
        <ul>
         <li>
          <a target="_blank" title="Dining_Policy_F16_Update" href="/Images/Berg_dining_Policy_Fall16_update_tcm1703-123763.pdf">
           Dining Policy
          </a>
           
         </li>
         <li>
          <a target="_blank" title="Dining_Venue_Policy_UPDATED_S16" href="/Images/Berg_Dining_Venues_Policy_Spring16_Update_tcm1703-110495.pdf">
           Dining Venues Policy
          </a>
           
         </li>
         <li>
          <a target="_blank" title="Meal-Plan-Eligibility-Policy.pdf" href="/Images/Meal-Plan-Eligibility-Policy_tcm1703-51565.pdf">
           Meal Plan Eligibility Policy
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
        <h2>
         Dining Dollars 
        </h2>
        <p>
         Dining Dollars are included in most meal plans and provide a component of declining balance, same as cash, that can be used at any of the dining locations on campus. Dining Dollars may be used throughout the semester, while in academic session. Once Dining Dollars are exhausted, they may not be replenished. We recommend adding 'Berg Bucks through the Controller's Office. 
        </p>
        <h2>
         'BERG BUCKS 
        </h2>
        <p>
         'BERG BUCKS (formerly Flex Dollars), is the ultimate compliment to the campus experience for students. 'BERG BUCKS may be applied toward on-campus dining venues, Muhlenberg catering orders, the 'Berg Bookshop, campus laundry equipment located in major residence halls and participating off campus merchants as identified by the 'Berg Bucks logo. More information on 'Berg Bucks
        </p>
        <h2>
         Credit Cards 
        </h2>
        <p>
         Credit cards are accepted in all of our dining locations. Students may use their Visa, Mastercard, American Express or Discover card for their convenience. 
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="sub-news-bottom">
       <div class="sub-news-bottom-rt">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="openid-box">
     </div>
     <div class="clear">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="bottom-corners">
     <div class="br-corner">
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div id="address">

    </div>

      Muhlenberg College
     </a>
     | Dining Services
     <br />
     2400 Chew Street | Seegers Union Building | Allentown PA 18104
